summary: Provides utilities and builder classes to construct, configure, and manage Kubernetes JobSet resources (including Argo JobSet specifications) for Metaflow workflows, offering a fluent API for setting annotations, labels, images, resources, environment variables, secrets, and replica counts, as well as serialization, monitoring, termination, and status querying of JobSets.
business_intent: Enable Metaflow users to orchestrate scalable, multiâ€‘replica jobs on Kubernetes via JobSet/Argo, simplifying job definition, deployment, and lifecycle management within data science pipelines.
